plot: Mitch Mackowski, a third string wrestler, finally gets the call to play. Unfortunately for him, the call comes after a night of illegal substances.
title: Yellow Hammer
plot_es: Mitch Mackowski, a third string wrestler, finally gets the call to play. Unfortunately for him, the call comes after a night of illegal substances.
plot_en: Mitch Mackowski, a third string wrestler, finally gets the call to play. Unfortunately for him, the call comes after a night of illegal substances.
